purpose: Provide educational resources and practical exercises for learning about large language model engineering
principle: Utilizes Jupyter Notebooks and Python to deliver interactive learning experiences and hands-on coding exercises
reusability: Course materials can be reused for educational purposes and adapted for different learning environments
limitations: Primarily focused on educational content; not a standalone software application
name: LLM-Engineering-Essentials
description: Materials for the LLM Engineering Essentials course
highlight: Comprehensive course materials for mastering LLM engineering practices
